articles.title: Thailand records first Omicron death in Hat Yai - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): An 86-year-old woman, who had apparently received two Pfizer jabs, became the first person in Thailand to succumb to the Omicron variant, Songkhla public health authorities said on Sunday (Jan 16).
